title: Celebrity X Factor's Olivia Olson's life growing up in the limelight after Love Actually
text:

Olivia Olson is best known for her childhood acting role of talented schoolgirl Joanna in the 2003 Christmas film Love Actually and is now starring on The X Factor : Celebrity with hopes of becoming a hitmaker.

The American beauty, 27, who was only eleven years old when she appeared in the festive favourite, has had a successful TV and film career and even boasts 60.6 thousand YouTube subscribers - who tune in to hear her sing.

Here is a look inside the singing hopefuls life since rising to fame 16 years ago with her rendition of Mariah Carey’s All I Want For Christmas Is You in Richard Curtis’s Christmas classic.

(Image: WireImage)

The brunette is no amateur singer, with her career being firmly carved thanks to her powerful voice.

After Love Actually, the Californian native starred in Disney’s long-running TV show Phineas And Ferb from 2007 to 2015.

Olivia lent her voice to the character of Vanessa Doofenshmirtz in the cartoon who is a goth and daughter of evil scientist.

Another voice over role that she scooped is Marceline the Vampire Queen in adult cartoon Adventure Time.

Olivia often sings in the show as her edgy character loves to play and electric base.

Another cartoon character she voices is Bliss in the reboot of The Powerpuff Girls.

The performer has also voiced characters in a number of video games such as the Adventure Time franchises' games and Lego Dimensions.o

(Image: ITV UNIVERSAL)

In 2017, Olivia returned to her Love Actually roots by taking part in the movie sequel as part of Red Nose Day 2017 on BBC One.

In November last year, Olivia announced on Instagram that she would be starring in Grapfruit film that is a musical comedy that she and the team are seeking funding for.

She told her fans: "Grapefruit the film nov 2018 So...Did you know every grapefruit has a soulmate? I’m happy to announce I will be playing the lead role in the bizarrely wonderful project #GRAPEFRUIT a short musical comedy that follows a grapefruit turned human in her quest to find true love. Yes, I’m serious. We have an amazing team:@grapefruit_the_film @zachbell1212 @marianhillmusic @holliswchambers."

Olivia must feel right at home on The X Factor: Celebrity as she has already released music and pens her own lyrics.

She released her debut album named Beauty Is Chaos in 2013 which was followed by Nowhere Land in June last year.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: Instagram)

The accomplished star also has a blossoming love life with her handsome beau who she often shares cute snaps of on Instagram.

However, she is private about his name and has kept it under wraps and refused to answer fans who have littered the comments asking for who her man is.

One romance she has previously shared on is that with her co-star Thomas Brodie-Sangster.

In 2016, she told E! News how she had a soft spot for her pint-sized fellow actor Thomas, who was twelve at the time.

She told: “I was really nervous because I kind of had a crush on Thomas back in the day and I was also worried because I was taller than him."

The pretty actress also revealed that it washer first kiss and on-screen kiss.

* The X Factor: Celebrity continues on Saturday on ITV.
description: The American actress and singer, who is best known for her role in Love Actually, has had an impressive career on screen
